item.title: How PM Modi got bulletproof shield out of his way freely met people
item.description: Narendra Modi overruled strong objections from his security detail and shunned the bulletproof enclosure to connect directly with people during his maiden Independence Day speech as PM on Friday
item.itunes:subtitle: Narendra Modi overruled strong objections from his security detail and shunned the bulletproof enclosure to connect directly with people during his maiden Independence Day speech as PM on Friday
item.itunes:summary: Narendra Modi overruled strong objections from his security detail and shunned the bulletproof enclosure to connect directly with people during his maiden Independence Day speech as PM on Friday

item.title: Indias largest indigenously built warship INS Kolkata inducted into Indian Navy
item.description: Constructed by the Mazagon Dock Ltd the 6800tonne Kolkataclass stealth destroyer has been designed by the Indian Navys design bureau Its keel was laid down in September 2003 and the ship was launched in March 2006
item.itunes:subtitle: Constructed by the Mazagon Dock Ltd the 6800tonne Kolkataclass stealth destroyer has been designed by the Indian Navys design bureau Its keel was laid down in September 2003 and the ship was launched in March 2006
item.itunes:summary: Constructed by the Mazagon Dock Ltd the 6800tonne Kolkataclass stealth destroyer has been designed by the Indian Navys design bureau Its keel was laid down in September 2003 and the ship was launched in March 2006

item.title: Budget session a fruitful outing but RS a worry
item.description: The NDA government may pat itself on the back for conducting a smooth and productive budget session of Parliament However the Rajya Sabha continues to be a major cause of concern for BJP floor managers
item.itunes:subtitle: The NDA government may pat itself on the back for conducting a smooth and productive budget session of Parliament However the Rajya Sabha continues to be a major cause of concern for BJP floor managers
item.itunes:summary: The NDA government may pat itself on the back for conducting a smooth and productive budget session of Parliament However the Rajya Sabha continues to be a major cause of concern for BJP floor managers

item.title: BJP chief Amit Shah to unveil his team today
item.description: Ending speculation over the new office bearers of the party BJP chief Amit Shah will on Saturday announce his team that has been packed with young faces
item.itunes:subtitle: Ending speculation over the new office bearers of the party BJP chief Amit Shah will on Saturday announce his team that has been packed with young faces
item.itunes:summary: Ending speculation over the new office bearers of the party BJP chief Amit Shah will on Saturday announce his team that has been packed with young faces

item.title: PMs address outlines Clean India vision
item.description: In his maiden Independence Day speech Prime Minister Narendra Modi reemphasised the NDA governments focus on the Swachh Bharat mission and its target to provide every rural household with a toilet by 2019 Mahatma Gandhis 150th birth anniversary
item.itunes:subtitle: In his maiden Independence Day speech Prime Minister Narendra Modi reemphasised the NDA governments focus on the Swachh Bharat mission and its target to provide every rural household with a toilet by 2019 Mahatma Gandhis 150th birth anniversary
item.itunes:summary: In his maiden Independence Day speech Prime Minister Narendra Modi reemphasised the NDA governments focus on the Swachh Bharat mission and its target to provide every rural household with a toilet by 2019 Mahatma Gandhis 150th birth anniversary

item.title: Is Nitin Gadkari angling for Maharashtra CM seat
item.description: The BJPs hunt for a chief ministerial candidate in Maharashtra could be nearing its end with Nagpur strongman Nitin Gadkari positioning himself as a mainstay for the party in the state
item.itunes:subtitle: The BJPs hunt for a chief ministerial candidate in Maharashtra could be nearing its end with Nagpur strongman Nitin Gadkari positioning himself as a mainstay for the party in the state
item.itunes:summary: The BJPs hunt for a chief ministerial candidate in Maharashtra could be nearing its end with Nagpur strongman Nitin Gadkari positioning himself as a mainstay for the party in the state

item.title: PM promises a bank account for every citizen
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday kicked off a revamped financial inclusion programme Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana to bring 75 million poor households into the banking system
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday kicked off a revamped financial inclusion programme Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana to bring 75 million poor households into the banking system
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday kicked off a revamped financial inclusion programme Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana to bring 75 million poor households into the banking system

item.title: To decentralise Delhi PM Modi suggests out of town meetings
item.description: In line with his efforts to project the NDA government as truly national and not focused just on New Delhi PM Narendra Modi is planning to hold bigticket bilateral multilateral and Centrestate meetings outside the capital
item.itunes:subtitle: In line with his efforts to project the NDA government as truly national and not focused just on New Delhi PM Narendra Modi is planning to hold bigticket bilateral multilateral and Centrestate meetings outside the capital
item.itunes:summary: In line with his efforts to project the NDA government as truly national and not focused just on New Delhi PM Narendra Modi is planning to hold bigticket bilateral multilateral and Centrestate meetings outside the capital

item.title: 19yrold hostility in way of MayaMulayam ties
item.description: When old rivals Nitish Kumar and Lalu Prasad got together to take on the BJP in Bihar the question that most people asked was will Mayawati and Mulayam Singh Yadav whove been at daggers drawn for nearly two decades also join hands in UP
item.itunes:subtitle: When old rivals Nitish Kumar and Lalu Prasad got together to take on the BJP in Bihar the question that most people asked was will Mayawati and Mulayam Singh Yadav whove been at daggers drawn for nearly two decades also join hands in UP
item.itunes:summary: When old rivals Nitish Kumar and Lalu Prasad got together to take on the BJP in Bihar the question that most people asked was will Mayawati and Mulayam Singh Yadav whove been at daggers drawn for nearly two decades also join hands in UP

item.title: Modis new development paradigm
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi Friday unveiled a development paradigm to steer the economy out of its sticky slowdown asking foreign investors to set up hubs even as he invoked Mahatma Gandhis Swadeshi philosophy to make India selfreliant in manufacturing
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi Friday unveiled a development paradigm to steer the economy out of its sticky slowdown asking foreign investors to set up hubs even as he invoked Mahatma Gandhis Swadeshi philosophy to make India selfreliant in manufacturing
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi Friday unveiled a development paradigm to steer the economy out of its sticky slowdown asking foreign investors to set up hubs even as he invoked Mahatma Gandhis Swadeshi philosophy to make India selfreliant in manufacturing

item.title: Most opposition parties reluctant on sharing space with Congress
item.description: The Congress having been voted off power after 10 years appeared aimless in its role as an effective Opposition during the justconcluded budget session of Parliament
item.itunes:subtitle: The Congress having been voted off power after 10 years appeared aimless in its role as an effective Opposition during the justconcluded budget session of Parliament
item.itunes:summary: The Congress having been voted off power after 10 years appeared aimless in its role as an effective Opposition during the justconcluded budget session of Parliament

item.title: Some embarrassing moments meant it wasnt a smooth sail
item.description: The government may have claimed credit for the passage of longpending judicial appointments commission bill but the justconcluded session of Parliament was not without its share of embarrassment for the government
item.itunes:subtitle: The government may have claimed credit for the passage of longpending judicial appointments commission bill but the justconcluded session of Parliament was not without its share of embarrassment for the government
item.itunes:summary: The government may have claimed credit for the passage of longpending judicial appointments commission bill but the justconcluded session of Parliament was not without its share of embarrassment for the government

item.title: Shun violence dont bloody our land help green it PM
item.description: In a sign of the importance he places on political order peace and stability Prime Minister Narendra Modi has called for an end to the strife and violence that emanates from casteism communalism and terrorism for the next ten years
item.itunes:subtitle: In a sign of the importance he places on political order peace and stability Prime Minister Narendra Modi has called for an end to the strife and violence that emanates from casteism communalism and terrorism for the next ten years
item.itunes:summary: In a sign of the importance he places on political order peace and stability Prime Minister Narendra Modi has called for an end to the strife and violence that emanates from casteism communalism and terrorism for the next ten years

item.title: India Inc impressed gives a thumbsup to Modi govts House management
item.description: Even as the NDA government failed to take up the muchawaited insurance bill seeking to increase the foreign direct investment limit to 49 from the current 26 in Parliament the industry and thinktanks seemed satisfied with the first session of Parliament after the change of guard at the Centre
item.itunes:subtitle: Even as the NDA government failed to take up the muchawaited insurance bill seeking to increase the foreign direct investment limit to 49 from the current 26 in Parliament the industry and thinktanks seemed satisfied with the first session of Parliament a
item.itunes:summary: Even as the NDA government failed to take up the muchawaited insurance bill seeking to increase the foreign direct investment limit to 49 from the current 26 in Parliament the industry and thinktanks seemed satisfied with the first session of Parliament after the change of guard at the Centre

item.title: Digital learning one of NDA govts priorities
item.description: Keeping in mind global trends the government will emphasise on digitalisation of education PM Narendra Modi also emphasised on a digital India in his Independence Day speech on Friday
item.itunes:subtitle: Keeping in mind global trends the government will emphasise on digitalisation of education PM Narendra Modi also emphasised on a digital India in his Independence Day speech on Friday
item.itunes:summary: Keeping in mind global trends the government will emphasise on digitalisation of education PM Narendra Modi also emphasised on a digital India in his Independence Day speech on Friday
